name: Suburban Sneak
description:
You are a little, scruffy raccoon.

"They" are tall and stupid humans.

You are hungry

"They" don't want their property value to drop

Sneak around the neighborhood and take what the humans leave behind.

As they say, one mans trash is your treasure
------------------------------------------------------------
                                  Controls!
------------------------------------------------------------
Move Around - WASD  Or  Use  Arrow keys

Run! -  Hold down Left Shift
